I like to watch psychological thrillers because they make me think about my own life.
I enjoy sushi because it is delicious and healthy.
i like basketball.
i am an old woman.

participant_2.background:
I don't care that much about social media because I have better things to do with my time.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
i prefer winter over fall.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends at a Chinese restaurant.
I am so proud of my daughter for graduating at the top of her class!

content.text: Good! I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends last weekend.
Oh, that's nice! What did you do?
We went out to a Chinese restaurant. I'm not really a fan of Chinese food, but it was fun to spend time with my family and friends.
I'm glad you had a good time. I'm not a big fan of Chinese food either. I prefer sushi.
Sushi is good! I don't eat it very often because it's kind of expensive.
Yeah, it can be. But it's worth it.
I guess I'll have to try it again sometime.
You should! What are your plans for the rest of the week?
I don't have anything planned yet. What about you?
I'm going to watch a movie tonight. I'm thinking about seeing a psychological thriller.
Oh, those are good! I love psychological thrillers.
Me too! I think I'm going to see The Invisible Man.
I've heard good things about that movie. I'm going to have to check it out.
You should! It's supposed to be really good.
